Introduction
This topic contains information on identifying and providing notification to visually impaired Veterans and survivors, including
legal requirements to provide accommodations for visually impaired claimants
definition of visually impaired claimant
requirement to identify visually impaired claimants
enlarged font requirements
, and
attempting telephonic contact
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 1 - Priority Processing Programs and Special Requirements
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section None
